page.title: 12Health Service -Butley Area
page.content:
In this area there are no Doctors, Dentists or Hospitals, but there is a Sugery in Orford. The nearest Hospital Ipswich and the nearest Dentist is in Woodbridge. Most village Doctor's belong to an Emergency service and have special First Aid kit and C.B. so that they can cope with disasters like coach air crashes. If you are really ill and cannot go to the Surgery, then the Doctor comes to see you. When an old person needs to go to Hospital as an outpatient a Hospital car comes round. A mobile Chiropodist is available once a month. There is a Mother and Baby Clinic once a week and a Meals on Wheels service three times a week. There is also a Home Help Organisation.
School Doctors and Dentists visit the Schools with Mobile Surgeries.
